news_header: M/A-Com reported a revenue of $218.12 million for Q4 2024, a 38.8% increase year-over-year, with an EPS of $0.79.
news_original_title: M/A-Com (MTSI) Reports Q1 Earnings: What Key Metrics Have to Say
news_text: For the quarter ended December 2024, M/A-Com (MTSI) reported revenue of $218.12 million, up 38.8% over the same period last year. EPS came in at $0.79, compared to $0.58 in the year-ago quarter. The reported revenue exceeds the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $215.07 million, representing a surprise of +1.42%. The company also delivered an EPS surprise of +1.28%, with the consensus EPS estimate being $0.78. Investors are encouraged to monitor key financial metrics to assess the company's performance and stock price projections.
